summary: Build an app feature set including Auto Toll behavior change (create toll entry daily at day start instead of pre-filling the week) and a new Trip History menu screen that lists trips by traveller/date with trip counts and totals over a selectable date range.
architectural_notes: Trip History uses the same date range selector behavior as other pages.
Trip counting rules: morning+evening marked together counts as 2 trips; any single entry (including 'Other Traveller income') counts as 1 trip.

existing_features.title: Change Auto Toll Add behavior so that when Auto Toll is enabled it auto-creates at most one Toll car-expense entry per day (weekdays only), instead of pre-filling Toll entries for every weekday in the currently selected date range/week.

Add a Trip History screen accessible from the in-app menu that uses the same global Date Range selection used across the ledger pages, and displays trip history rows with: Traveller name, Trip date, and Trip count per day; also include co-traveller income entries as single-trip records; and show total trip count at the bottom for the selected date range.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update Auto Toll to add a single toll entry at the start of each day (Monâ€“Fri) instead of pre-filling toll entries for the entire week.

Add Trip History screen in Menu showing traveller name, trip date, and trip count (morning+evening together counts as 2; single entry including 'Other Traveller income' counts as 1) and show total trips at bottom for selected date range.

projectName: Update Auto Toll to daily-only and add Trip History with date-range totals
